name: CoombesByrne2D

r.expression: Delta / np.pi + 2 * V * r - g * r * r

V.expression: V * V - np.pi * np.pi * r * r + eta + (v_syn - V) * g + Cr

references: [Coombes_Byrne_2019] Coombes, S., & Byrne, Á. (2019). Next generation neural mass models. In *Nonlinear Dynamics in Computational Neuroscience* (pp. 1-16). Springer, Cham.
